required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 13, 2016
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Reader Training Processes by Comparing Clinical Interpretations to Centralized Expert Reads

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to evaluate the agreement between florbetapir F 18 scan interpretation in the clinic and by expert readers.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Diagnostic

primary_outcome.measure: Agreement Between Expert Panel and Clinical Practice Reads
primary_outcome.description: Agreement between expert panel consensus scan interpretations and clinical practice reader scan interpretations was calculated as a weighted Kappa value across all cases and all clinical practice readers.

arm_group.description: Approximately 250 florbetapir F 18 scans and final scan reports interpreted in a clinical setting will be collected from physicians across the country. These results will then be compared to expert panel interpretations for the same scans.

intervention.description: No study drug will be administered in this study - scans previously acquired in the course of clinical practice.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Scan obtained for clinical reasons
Exclusion Criteria:
- None

group.title: Clinical Practice Scans
group.description: 241 florbetapir F 18 scans and final scan reports interpreted in a clinical setting were collected from physicians across the country. These results were then compared to expert panel interpretations for the same scans. florbetapir F 18: No study drug was administered in this study - scans previously acquired in the course of clinical practice.

group.description: 241 florbetapir F 18 scans and final scan reports interpreted in a clinical setting were collected from physicians across the country. These results were then compared to expert panel interpretations for the same scans. florbetapir F 18: No study drug was administered in this study - scans previously acquired in the course of clinical practice.

measure.title: Age, Customized
measure.description: Age was not collected in this study.

measure.title: Gender, Customized
measure.description: Gender was not collected in this study.

measure.title: Region of Enrollment
measure.description: All scans were collected from imaging centers in the US.

outcome.title: Agreement Between Expert Panel and Clinical Practice Reads
outcome.description: Agreement between expert panel consensus scan interpretations and clinical practice reader scan interpretations was calculated as a weighted Kappa value across all cases and all clinical practice readers.

These results were then compared to expert panel interpretations for the same scans. florbetapir F 18: No study drug was administered in this study - scans previously acquired in the course of clinical practice.

measure.title: Agreement Between Expert Panel and Clinical Practice Reads

reported_events.desc: No study drug was administered in this study - scans previously acquired in the course of clinical practice, therefore no adverse event information was collected.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
